substringMaxResults.description: Specifies how many partial word hits should be returned in total. Only works together with substring = true.
substringMaxResults.title: Substring Max Results

startswith.description: Like substring = true, but only finds words that begin with the specified search term
startswith.title: Starts With

supersynsets.description: Whether each synonym group is supplied with its (optional) generic terms
supersynsets.title: Supersynsets

baseform.description: Specifies the basic form for the search term if it is not already a basic form
baseform.title: Baseform

subsynsets.description: Whether each synonym group has its (optional) sub-terms supplied
subsynsets.title: Subsynsets

similar.description: This also returns up to five similarly written words for each answer. This is useful to be able to make a suggestion to the user in the event of a possible typing error.
similar.title: Similar

substringFromResults.description: Specifies from which entry the partial word hits are to be returned. Only works together with substring = true.
substringFromResults.title: Substring From Results

substring.description: Whether up to ten words are returned for each answer that only contain the search term as a partial word
substring.title: Substring

text.description: The word to get synonyms for
text.title: Text

init_kwargs.title: Scade tools: OpenThesaurus
init_kwargs.description: Get synonmns for German words using the OpenThesaurus API
